ingredients.item: 1 garlic clove, chopped 8 shiitake mushrooms, halved
1 red pepper, sliced 100g cavolo nero, roughly chopped
1 tbsp black or white sesame seeds, toasted

instructions.step: Cook the noodles according to pack instructions, drain, then rinse under cold water and set aside. Meanwhile, mix together the mirin, rice vinegar and soy and HP sauces.

Heat the oil in a large wok over a high heat. Add the onion, garlic, mushrooms and red pepper, and stir-fry until slightly softened â€“ about 3 minutes. Add the cavolo nero and fry for another minute. Add the sauce and noodles and stir-fry until hot and sticky. Sprinkle with the sesame seeds and serve.
